pages.title: Required Blocks
pages.text: 1x Fusion Chamber Controller $(br) 3x Fusion Core $(br) 1x Reactor Energy Input $(br) 1x Reactor Item Input $(br) 1x Reactor Item Output $(br) 62x Reactor Casing $(br) 36x Reactor Glass

pages.title: Optional Blocks
pages.text: Reactor energy input and item input/output blocks can be placed anywhere that requires a reactor casing but not anywhere there is reactor glass.$(br2)Reactor glass is optional. Anywhere that requires reactor glass can be replaced with reactor casing. Make it look however you want.
